reasons_to_visit.details: Petřín Hill and other parks bloom with beautiful cherry blossoms, creating stunning photo opportunities.
Mild temperatures and increasing sunshine make April ideal for walking tours and outdoor exploration.
Traditional Easter markets and celebrations throughout the city showcase Czech culture and traditions.
Outdoor terraces, beer gardens, and seasonal attractions reopen for warmer weather.
Pre-peak season means shorter lines at attractions while still maintaining good weather.

reasons_to_avoid.details: April can bring frequent rain showers requiring flexible outdoor planning and rain gear.
Accommodation and dining prices begin rising as tourist season approaches.
